channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Michael McIntyre's The Wheel
channel.desc: Michael McIntyre hosts his hit game show packed with huge stars, big laughs and a giant spinning wheel. Can the contestants answer their way to a fortune? The celebrities in this episode include Josh Widdicombe, Chris Harris, Colin Jackson, Harriet Kelmsley, Shirley Ballas and Frankie Bridge. Jordan North and William Hanson are in the double chair.
